Generated Narrative: ValueSet v3-ObservationActContextAgeType

Language: en

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in LOINCObservationActContextAgeType

name: ObservationActContextAgeType
title: ObservationActContextAgeType
description: **Definition:**The ways the age of an entity involved in an act can be measured, calculated or otherwise expressed in order to provide context for another act.
